markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Acute Scent](/Feats.aspx?ID=5812) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

When your anger is heightened, your sense of smell improves. While you're raging, you gain [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) with a range of 30 feet.

<title level="2">Acute Scent leads to...</title>
[Instinctive Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=5840), [Supernatural Senses](/Feats.aspx?ID=5822)
name: Acute Scent
